speaker: President.
english: President. − The next item is the report ( A6-0158/2008 ) by Margie Sudre, on behalf of the Committee on Regional Development, on the strategy for the outermost regions: achievements and future prospects ( 2008/2010(INI) ).
original: President. − The next item is the report ( A6-0158/2008 ) by Margie Sudre, on behalf of the Committee on Regional Development, on the strategy for the outermost regions: achievements and future prospects ( 2008/2010(INI) ).
